Kyoka, you have maturity needed for being a leader since your childhood. Your people are proud of you and see you as their model. You are diligent and wise, leading people to explore blue seas and skies with guide of starlight. Start grand adventures with your allies, and dig deep into the universe. But be cautious, for your suspicious enemies are gazing upon your land.
